ing: 1 fluid ounce orange liqueur (such as Grand MarnierÂ®)
4 fluid ounces orange pekoe tea, or more to taste
des: "The combination of amaretto, orange liqueur, and hot orange pekoe tea make this warm drink taste reminiscent of blueberries."
ins: Combine amaretto and orange liqueur in a brandy snifter or glass. Add hot tea to taste.
